description:
Includes all the same Free translations as Simple Bible, in a nice TouchPad friendly interface.  Some of the features from Simple Bible aren’t in the app yet, so you might wait before dispatching of your Phone Based Version of Simple Bible.

Current Feature List:  

-Bibles in multiple translations in English, German 
and Spanish for you to download.

-OFFLINE READING - Once The Bible is downloaded to your phone, you may use it without a data connection.  

-Portrait or landscape reading

-Multiple bookmarks

If you have any problems, please read the help section or send an email to: help@bitsofgodsoftware.com.  We can resolve most problems via email.  Please don’t leave a support question in the reviews because we have no real way of replying to them.
